description:
In Pottsville, Pennsylvania, our legal team at the Law Offices of Anthony Urban, P.C., has been fighting for clients' rights in personal injury and criminal defense cases for decades. We have a deep understanding of and extensive experience in the legal system and the state and federal courts, and that gives us an advantage when it comes to helping people obtain positive resolutions to their cases.

In addition to our Pottsville office, we have locations in Mount Carmel and Mahanoy City, and we take phone calls around the clock. Clients may set virtual appointments, and we offer home and hospital visits.

Personal Injury Representation

We take cases involving premises liability, product liability, medical malpractice, birth injuries, nursing home abuse, sexual abuse, toxic mold, toxic torts, motor vehicle accidents, dog bites, wrongful death and class action lawsuits.

Assistance With Benefits Programs

Workers who have sustained injuries or illnesses can come to us for assistance in applying for benefits through programs such as workers' compensation, Social Security Disability Insurance and FELA.

Estate Planning Advice

Our law offices help people to identify the estate planning tools that are right for them and develop a plan for the future that covers their own health and financial conditions as well as the well-being of their beneficiaries after they are gone.

Criminal Defense Strategies

When someone is facing criminal charges, contacting a skilled criminal defense attorney immediately is essential. The attorneys at the Law Offices of Anthony Urban, P.C., are ready, willing and able to create customized defense strategies to fight charges involving drugs, DUI, violent crimes, property crimes, juvenile offenses and more.

Initial consultations are free, and we offer night and weekend appointment options.
